title: Senior Web Developer
body: I stepped into the role of Senior Web Developer at Deep Fried, undertaking broader responsibilities that include leading the development department with tasks such as delegating responsibilities to team members, training new hires, and handling projects of greater complexity.

title: Web Developer
body: I transformed fully custom-made designs into WordPress sites, utilizing HTML, CSS (typically SASS), PHP, and JavaScript. Beyond WordPress, I expanded my expertise to include React and Gatsby, broadening our offerings and creating modern web solutions.

title: Web Developer
body: I designed brand identity packages, crafted responsive websites, and collaborated as an independent contractor with agencies looking to outsource.

title: Graphic Design Instructor
body: I taught foundational graphic design classes focusing on 2-D design, color theory, composition, illustration, photography, and typography.
